body: Game is just a screen that says 'click to start', 0/10
author: MetaCritic

body: I wish it was more realistic
author: Friender69

body: Wow, this game was a trip. I can't believe they got FOUR friends in here. Sometimes its hard just having ONE of those XD. It's one of the most innovative and grand experiences of my life. Grob fills a hole I never knew I had... Kraken Junior dispelled my fear of the ocean and instilled a fear of pirates. Wick looks like a plushie I would buy immediately. And Pilz makes me feel a certain way with his delectable looks. 10/10 game.
author: Erz McMule
